16 template<typename data_type>class Lookup {
17 public:
24  Lookup(const data_type * table, int size){
25  table_ = table;
26  size_ = size;
27  }
28 
35  data_type value(data_type x){
36  unsigned int p1, p2;
37  unsigned int i;
38  data_type delta_x, delta_y;
39  data_type output;
40 
41  i = 0;
42  while( (x >= table_[i+2]) && (i < (size_-2)*2) ){
43  i+=2;
44  }
45 
46  p1 = i;
47  p2 = i+2;
48 
49  //now calculate the slope between the y values
50  delta_x = table_[p1] - table_[p2];
51  if( delta_x == 0 ){
52  return -1;
53  }
54  delta_y = table_[p1+1] - table_[p2+1];
55  output = ((x - table_[p1]) * delta_y) / delta_x + table_[p1+1];
56 
57  return output;
58  }
59 
60 private:
61  const data_type * table_;
62  unsigned int size_;
63 };
64 
65 #endif /* LOOKUP_HPP_ */
